channel.title: Need help making people admin on 508
channel.description: Ok so when the server first started out i could make myself admin and i did.But then when people joined i tried everything i could to a kid i wanted to make admin first i tried the command ::giveadmin like 10times did not work and i tried doing it with the char.file but it still did not work the rights: 0 i changed to rights: 2 and saved but still did not work i opened back up and it was back to rights:0 i even tried compiling same did not work.Someone please help me!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Need help making people admin on 508
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

… You open .dat with notepad. Follow the steps that i said and it works.

He isn’t trying to make HIMSELF an admin, its making OTHER people Admin. His 508 obviously doesnt have giveadmin commands.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making people admin on 508

item.title: Need help making people admin on 508
item.dc:creator: @Owner_A_Raffo Owner A Raffo
item.description:
@Owner_A_Raffo wrote:

go into Commands.java then press Ctrl + H then search for the source’s dudes name then type urs in the box below it then click replace all then go on the server then u can do it
its either ::admin username or ::giveadmin username

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making people admin on 508

item.title: Need help making people admin on 508
item.dc:creator: @Deadly-specz Deadly-specz
item.description:
@Deadly-specz wrote:

NO DUDE I KNOW THE PROBLEM! Go to the “characters” folder. There you should see an account. Right click account and open program with wordpad. It will ask you what program you want to open with, and click wordpad. There set your character rights to 2.

any other concers or questions ill help.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making people admin on 508

item.title: Need help making people admin on 508
item.dc:creator: @MasterofPK MasterofPK
item.description:
@MasterofPK wrote:

Ok you made you self Owner by changing this right?

if (p.username.equals("#you#")) { p.rights = 3; }

Ok so what you want to do is.

if (p.username.equals("#you#")) { p.rights = 3; } if (p.username.equals("#Admin#")) { p.rights = 2; }

Just add another one underneath.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making people admin on 508

item.title: Need help making people admin on 508
item.dc:creator: @joeiscrazy1 joeiscrazy1
item.description:
@joeiscrazy1 wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:5, topic:273858”][quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=361893.msg2751168#msg2751168 date=1239919866]
go into login.java and find an admins name change it to yours or somthing save and compile.
[/quote][/quote]

Thats not the ploblem cause right after i made my self admin i could not mak anyone anything anymore

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making people admin on 508

item.title: Need help making people admin on 508
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“wwe4eva, post:2, topic:273858”]Ok, are you click file and save? If yes. Thats why.

You have to click file, save as. Then click the drop down menu where it says .txt and put all files. Then save it as the players name .dat so for example haharofl.dat.

Compile and voila. Done. If you just click save, it saves as .txt. therefore not savin in the correct format.

I hope I helped ;)[/quote]
Can you even read .dat’s in text format? If yes, how?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making people admin on 508
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

Ok, are you click file and save? If yes. Thats why.

You have to click file, save as. Then click the drop down menu where it says .txt and put all files. Then save it as the players name .dat so for example haharofl.dat.

Compile and voila. Done. If you just click save, it saves as .txt. therefore not savin in the correct format.

I hope I helped
